Member Function Documentation

void Matter::emulsify ( int  tint = 0  ) 

This method selects the given tint as the one that the model should be soaked in.

It is suspended in an emulsion.

void Matter::soak (  ) 

This method soaks the model that this matter lives in with the stored tint, or the default tint, if there is no emulsion.
